about-me.description: Greetings, I am a Front-End Developer, someone proactive who is always looking for new challenges and someone very enthusiastic about constantly learning. I love the JavaScript language and it's what I've used since I started in this programming world, but I'm open to learning any stack whenever the opportunity exists.

projects.starwars-app: It is a simple Star Wars universe blog using the 'swapi' API that is still in process.
